comment: A kind of contraposition law that infers an image subclass from a subclass of a preimage. Raph Levien remarks: "Likely this could be proved directly, and ~ fvimacnv would be the special case of ` A ` being a singleton, but it works this way round too." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
